mean_cn: vt. 使瘫痪；使麻痹；使不能活动
mean_en: to make somebody unable to feel or move all or part of their body; to prevent something from functioning normally
sentence: The disease may paralyze his body, but not his thinking.
sentence_trans: 疾病可以让他的身体瘫痪，却不能麻痹他的思想。
word_etyma: para旁边 + lyze=loose松散 → 身体旁边无力 → 使瘫痪，使麻痹
